abstract: Motion Picture Assn of America announces that websites Popcorntime.io and YTS.to were shut down for illegally distributing movies following two separate court orders from Canada and New Zealand.
lead_paragraph: Separate orders from Canada and New Zealand shut down Popcorntime.io and YTS.to, the Motion Picture Association of America said.

headline.print_headline: Courts Close Two Websites That Illegally Showed Films

snippet: Separate orders from Canada and New Zealand shut down Popcorntime.io and YTS.to, the Motion Picture Association of America said.
